text:
I thought I’m cured for my depression. Since 5 years ago I changed my lifestyle. I have better life and I’m being so busy.
But this year since going to appointments in dentist week after week, seeing the same people I feel so awkward and just feeling so bad as if I’m some sort of handicapped that people kepts on mocking. 
I don’t like the feeling especially when I’m already having bad life around people, roommates and everyday people I met.
I hate this feeling that society keep want to push me to be “better” with social skills. Why can’t they just understand that I’m just not talkative but they think that being quiet means I’m hiding some knife behind me and about to stab them all. I don’t get it.
I’m struggling and stressing so much I can’t seem to get any sleep. I’m lacking sleep so much I feel like I’m passing out at job. 
I love what I do and I enjoy it and I needed it the most. I can’t lose a job.
I used to think it’ll be the easiest to finally leave when I was fired from my job because then nobody will need to see me or wonder where I’d been. 
But now that I feel like I might lost my job, I’m thinking something different again to survive.
I’m so scared sometimes but sometimes I just wish there’s just way for me to be happy.
I think someone I love is taking anti anxiety or depression pills because they seem to be very happy and really really normal.
But to me, I’ll never be normal, I was given this life to live, I didn’t have friends. 
I had that one friend in high school who was trying hard to make me feel better but I lost her because I’m just such a cry baby, I acted too immature for her and she’s a senior and I’m just a freshman, she could have been the exact person I wanted to be friends with now, but I no longer find someone like her.
Anyways I’m rambling and I need to rest my stupid head or it’ll explode.
I don’t know anymore. I’m overthinking. I think I dread 2023 will be very bad for me

People always lie and they’re never accountable for anything they do or say. 
They always make excuses for everything they do. They tell me that I shouldn’t make excuses but that does not apply to them. They get to live a happy life and I don’t because I’m horrible and I deserve eternal suffering. 
They will always lie. Always. They think I’m a nightmare and they think I’m disgusting. They lie to your face and be nice but behind your back they will destroy you. And it’s funny to them.

So many people in my life going through something. Somethings of varying degrees, but all equally important. Made me realize people need someone to listen to them. I try my best to be that for everyone that comes to me looking to talk, but it's hard to balance their problems and try to deal with my own problems all in my head. I care about and worry about everyone in my life, but I can't play therapist when I think about ending my shit every damn day. 
I try my hardest to stay positive and be grateful, but it's hard to not see how messed up the world can be.

Headache…six hours…plus I feel like I am delusional after talking with my father yesterday, since clearly he knows better and I know nothing. I had to get rid of a painting because he keeps thinking and telling me that it’s influencing my depression. I. Got. It. Because. I. Thought. It. Was. Cool. I keep saying to myself that I should stay away from people because I’m this delusional problematic ungrateful person, I wanted to tell my friends that “hey, maybe what my dad says about me is right, you probably shouldn’t be friends with me because I am no good.” Even after I move out of my parents house, my father is still probably going to control my life, cuz I can’t make my own decisions and decide what makes me happy because I have depression and anxiety. I’m too mentally ill to say anything.

Your dad sounds like an abusive walking L with no idea how to actually help for as much as he insists on controlling your actions. I don't have an easy straightforward answer for any of the awful things you're feeling, but it sounds like you are dealing with some actual external bullshit on top of everything.

My job drags me down so much, so tired of asking for guidance and getting a half ass effort from supervisors but then they'll be on my ass about assignments that theyve assigned me and Ive already finished. Just really debilitating and kills my self worth when it feels like no one listens to you
My dog of 10 years just passed away. He just waited for me and greeted me one last time just as I came home. Fucking shit man, just when I have been turning things around.
I hate that I catch feelings so quickly, I feel like such an idiot for thinking someone might actually be interested in me.

Me: I know I’ve been limiting my speaking output lately but I still need to shut up more often.
Also me: Then you shouldn’t have written this in the first place.

i'm so tired of pretending everything is okay or pushing my sadness aside. i keep a happy, "stable"  mask on because my parents already have a lot of problems to deal with and they say that i just add onto their issues whenever i express my feelings. i'm exhausted
